text: Austan Dean Goolsbee (born August 18, 1969) is an American economist.Austan Goolsbee Goolsbee was the Chair of the Council of Economic Advisers. He was a member of the cabinet of President Barack Obama and an acting fill-in anchor for WGN-TV in Chicago. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:United States Council of Economic Advisers Category:American television news anchors Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Texas Category:Scientists from Illinois Category:People from Waco, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Austan Goolsbee
